turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good Morning, I am hoping you can order a coffee for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, where do you want me to go?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, the one closest to your work?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, the one on Main and Telephone.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what can I order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a grande Nitro Cold Brew Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, room for cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you have them put about an inch of coconut milk on top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, do you take any sugars or syrups in the coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I just checked with the Main and Telegraph Starbucks, they do not have coconut milk in stock.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What other types of non-dairy alternatives do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have soy milk and almond milk, would you like to substitute one of those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, almond milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so I am ordering you a grande Nitro Cold Brew with an inch of almond milk on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please, and please make sure they add extra ice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do, your coffee has been ordered and will be at the pick up window for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, do I need my receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You, do not, but the receipt will be texted to you shortly.
